TEXT.TITLE: CLUB MEDITERRANEE <CMI.PA> - YEAR ENDED OCTOBER 31
TEXT.BODY: Parent company 1986 net profit 202.55 mln francs vs 171.31 mln Dividend 13.02 francs vs same, including 4.34 francs tax credit. (Note - company earlier reported consolidated net profit 315.9 mln francs vs 302.08 mln and consolidated attributable profit of 293.3 mln vs 266.6 mln.) REUTER
